description: ## Overview [oscompatible](https://www.npmjs.org/package/oscompatible) is a malicious package. This package contains malicious code, and its content was removed from the official package manager. While this package might be attempting to impersonate a valid organization, there is no connection between that organization and this package authorship. ## Remediation Avoid using all malicious instances of the `oscompatible` package. ## References - [NPM Security Placeholder](https://npmjs.com/package/oscompatible)
remediation: Avoid using all malicious instances of the oscompatible package.
title: Malicious Package

vulnDescription.Overview: oscompatible is a malicious package. This package contains malicious code, and its content was removed from the official package manager.
